column4: I need serious help. I`ve been through every MBR recovery site on the web. But I dont get any change. Windows is always started. Problem: Installed windows xp and had gutsy installed. Please help me!
fdisk -l returns that it boots sda2 no matter how many grub changes I do
dual boot or want to get rid of windows
which installed first xp/vista/ubuntu
ubuntu than xp
now grub is missing?
it's not loaded, yes. it goes right to windws
go to #eeepc
there are a couple of debian devs that hang there, they likely will know
Thanks, but please read what I wrote.. I've written a lot of what's on help...EeePC. I need help making Ubuntu Eee 8.04.1. I have a problem where I'm thrown to busybox instead of booting
you may also wish to look at the wiki for www.eeeuser.com or #eeepc
the problem is with Ubuntu, not the Eeepc. I need help booting custom kernel with Ubuntu
can you help me? I would be forever greatful
no such problems here. it works fine.
please read the resources I suggested.
The problem is when following: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/LiveCDCustomization
I add a custom kernel, as in https://help.ubuntu.com/community/LiveCDCustomization
the best resources are the ones I have suggested; ie not that one.
the kernel got squashfs and unionfs. But I can't get it to work. I'm on a mac, customizing Ubuntu. wiki.eeeuser.com can't help me with that. Can you please help me?
and please don't say call apple. I'm running ubuntu
Is your job to piss people of or actually to help people? I'm looking for help with ubuntu and you're answering like a bad programmed bot
not sure what help you want; cutting and pasting from the wiki seems silly.
True! The problem is that I get this message in casper.log     /init: /init: 1: cannot open /dev/fd0: No such file . And thanks for your interest! :)
